alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 7:41PM EST until December 14 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 845 PM EST. * At 740 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Apalachicola, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Nine Mile, Carrabelle Beach, Buck Siding, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Yent Place, Eleven Mile, Tilton, Beverly, Green Point, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place and Fort Gadsden. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EST for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EST for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
